NEUTRAL.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
NEUTRAL.dua_english: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from worry and grief, from incapacity and laziness, from cowardice and miserliness, from being heavily in debt and from being overpowered by (other) men.
NEUTRAL.caption: Stay Silent & Trust Allah — Everything Will Come Naturally | Mufti Menk

CALM.dua_arabic: رَبَّنَا أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْرًا وَتَوَفَّنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
CALM.dua_english: Our Lord, pour upon us patience and let us die as Muslims [in submission to You].
CALM.caption: Soothing Islamic Reminders | Words That Heal the Soul and Awaken the Heart

HAPPY.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي عَبْدُكَ، ابْنُ عَبْدِكَ، ابْنُ أَمَتِكَ، نَاصِيَتِي بِيَدِكَ، مَاضٍ فِيَّ حُكْمُكَ، عَدْلٌ فِيَّ قَضَاؤُكَ، أَسْأَلُكَ بِكُلِّ اسْمٍ هُوَ لَكَ سَمَّيْتَ بِهِ نَفْسَكَ، أَوْ أَنْزَلْتَهُ فِي كَتَابِكَ، أَوْ عَلَّمْتَهُ أَحَدًا مِنْ خَلْقِكَ، أَوِ اسْتَأْثَرْتَ بِهِ فِي عِلْمِ الْغَيْبِ عِنْدَكَ، أَنْ تَجْعَلَ الْقُرْآنَ رَبِيعَ قَلْبِي، وَنُورَ صَدْرِي، وَجَلَاءَ حُزْنِي، وَذَهَابَ هَمِّي.
HAPPY.dua_english: O Allah, I am Your slave, son of Your slave, son of Your handmaid, my forelock is in Your hand (i.e. You have total control over me), Your command over me is forever executed, Your decree over me is just. I ask You by every name belonging to You which You named Yourself with, or revealed in Your Book, or You taught to any of Your creation, or You have preserved in the knowledge of the unseen with You, that You make the Qur'an the life of my heart and the light of my bosom, and a departure for my sorrow and a release for my anxiety.
HAPPY.caption: The Secret to True Happiness You Keep Ignoring

HAPPY.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَىٰ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ، كُلَّمَا ذَكَرَهُ الذَّاكِرُونَ، وَكُلَّمَا غَفَلَ عَنْ ذِكْرِهِ الْغَافِلُونَ
HAPPY.dua_english: O Allah, send blessings upon our master Muhammad, whenever he is remembered by those who remember, and whenever he is forgotten by those who are heedless
HAPPY.caption: Smiling hearts, endless blessings upon the Prophet ﷺ ✨

SAD.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
SAD.dua_english: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow, weakness and laziness, miserliness and cowardice, the burden of debts and from being overpowered by men.
SAD.caption: Feeling Sad? Listen to this Powerful Islamic Reminder!

ANGRY.dua_arabic: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمْ | رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ | وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَنْ يَحْضُرُونِ
ANGRY.dua_english: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils, And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, lest they be present with me.
ANGRY.caption: You will NEVER BE ANGRY again after watching this | ISLAM

FEARFUL.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
FEARFUL.dua_english: O Allah, I take refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow, weakness and laziness, miserliness and cowardice, the burden of debts and from being overpowered by men.
FEARFUL.caption: Overcoming Fear & Anxiety in Islam: Powerful Lessons with Dr. Omar Suleiman

DISGUST.dua_arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
DISGUST.dua_english: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.
DISGUST.caption: THIS VIDEO WILL MAKE YOU CRY - EMOTIONAL!

SURPRISED.dua_arabic: اللھُمَّ اِنی أَسئَلکَ مِن فُجاءَۃِالخَیرِ وأَعوذُبِکَ مِنْ فُجاءَۃِ الشَّرِّ
SURPRISED.dua_english: O Allah, I ask You for good surprises and I seek refuge in You from bad surprises.
SURPRISED.caption: Allah Is Bringing an Unexpected Surprise Your Way! Expect the Unexpected!
